jalinopt

Class PipedLPSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • jalinopt.LPSolver
      • jalinopt.PipedLPSolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCPLEX, Cbc, LpSolve

    public abstract class PipedLPSolver
extends LPSolver
    Modelisation of an LP solvers that is implemented through a call to an external process.
